## SharedEntityQuadTree class

Wrapper of [ISharedQuadTree](./core.isharedquadtree.md)<!-- -->. Passing the hit test doesn't guarantee that the pointer is within the AABB, an additional check should be made in the [IHitTestComponent](./core.ihittestcomponent.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SharedEntityQuadTree<TUpdateArg, TTraits extends IHitTestableTrait> implements ISharedEntityQuadTree<TUpdateArg, TTraits> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ISharedEntityQuadTree](./core.isharedentityquadtree.md)<!-- -->&lt;TUpdateArg, TTraits&gt;
